resources.name: Introducing Wagtail
resources.description: During the last few months we have spent a good amount of time working with Wagtail, a really cool CMS built on top of the well-known Django framework.

resources.name: Getting started in Wagtail, a newcomer's perspective
resources.description: Having used Drupal almost exclusively as my main tool of choice for a while now, I was asked to put together a build using Wagtail. By [@kiwimind](https://twitter.com/kiwimind).

resources.name: Présentation de Wagtail, le dernier CMS Django
resources.description: Wagtail est un CMS relativement récent dans l’écosystème Django. Pour autant, son jeune âge ne l’empêche pas de posséder de nombreuses fonctionnalités que nous découvrirons dans cet article.

resources.name: Interactive 360 degree product views as a Wagtail streamfield block
Extending The Functionality of Email Forms in Wagtail
Wagtail: 2 Steps for Adding Pages Outside of the CMS
Code blocks for Wagtail using Pygments
Adding document previews to Wagtail CMS
Wagtail Tutorials: Build Blog Step by Step
resources.description: The tutorials teach you how to create a standard blog from scratch step by step.

resources.name: Python CMS Framework Review: Wagtail vs Django-CMS
resources.description: Talk about the difference between Django-CMS and Wagtail, the two most popular CMS framework in Python world.

resources.name: Oscar Wagtail demo project
resources.description: A Django recipe for integrating Oscar E-commerce into a Wagtail CMS application.

resources.name: An Introduction to Wagtail
resources.description: Eloise "Ducky" Macdonald-Meyer - This talk is an introduction to Wagtail, a content management system built on the Python web framework, Django.

resources.name: DjangoCon US 2015 - Wagtail - Yet Another Django CMS
resources.description: Tom Dyson - Tom will explain why his agency decided to build a new CMS, share some lessons learned in running a growing open source project, and outline Wagtail's roadmap to version 2 and beyond. [Slide deck](https://speakerdeck.com/tomdyson/wagtail-yet-another-cms-djangocon-us-2015).

resources.name: Wellington Wagtail CMS Meetup - Meet Wagtail
resources.description: Josh, Jordi and Rich, from the Springload dev team - An introductory session to Wagtail to showcase the main features it has to offer.

resources.name: DjangoCon US 2016 - Atomic Wagtail
resources.description: Kurt Wall – Brad Frost's atomic design principles are taking the way we design the web by storm. I'll explain what Wagtail is, how you can use it with atomic design principles, and some hurdles you might run into along the way with suggestions on how to help.

resources.name: PyCon Australia – Comparing Wagtail, Django CMS and Mezzanine
resources.description: Adam Brenecki – This talk explores the different approaches, strengths and weaknesses of each CMS, and what they mean for you as a developer and for your content editors.

resources.name: Wagtail — еще одна CMS на Django
resources.description: Mikalai Radchuk - This talk is an introduction to Wagtail in Russian.

resources.name: Podcast.__init__ Episode 58 - Wagtail with Tom Dyson
resources.description: In this episode Tom Dyson explains how Wagtail came to be created, what sets it apart from other options, and when you should implement it for your projects.

resources.name: Wagtail screencasts: Creating and displaying pages in Wagtail
resources.description: This video will show you how to create and display pages using the Wagtail CMS.
